name: Molecats - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is an Early Access version Soundtrack!
The Complete Soundtrack will be available for all DLC owners when Molecats release.

It is seven almost randomly selected (it’s a lie) tracks from Molecats OST by The Dilettant Orchestra.

Molecats - Original Soundtrack - Track listing:
01 Backlights
02 Good Joke
03 Vault Swing
04 Snowman Childhood
05 Fools Go Marching
06 Meewow
07 Molecats
Total Length: 26:44

The Dilettant Orchestra is:

Music by
Vasiliy Kashnikov
Nickolai Balinoff

Mixing & mastering
Nickolai Balinoff

Quotes & reactions:
“10 garbage containers out of 10!”
“Reminds me Frank Zappa...”
“In the best tradition of Terry Scott Taylor!!”
“I’ve got a сhronic headache out of this:E”
“Share your ‘shrooms with me, pls!”

short_description:
It is seven almost randomly selected (it’s a lie) tracks from Molecats OST by The Dilettant Orchestra.
More track we will add with Release game from Early Access.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: internal
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9XX or AMD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
